arts.ttl: Match report: The Bloomfield Road curse continues for Bolton Wanderers
arts.sum: Bolton Wanderers lost out against Blackpool once again - continuing a record of not having won at Bloomfield Road since 1977.

arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Blackpool and Bolton Wanderers, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

Blackpool might face an uphill battle, but they're not giving up hope yet of making a serious late run for the play-offs after the victory at Northampton kept them just about within touch. The Seasid...
